Articles.Content:
Mod used KAX

![q8i3zsJ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/q8i3zsJ.jpg)

real thing.

![as8C9OF.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/as8C9OF.jpg)

Seats two, has a wingspan of 10m.

takes off at 40m/s and has a cruise speed of 86m/s and a cruise altitude of 2,100m or 6,000ft.

Action Groups; 

Abort: Toggle Torque, ground use only.

0: Toggle Thrust Reverser, ground use only.

Before flight select control from here on the probe at the tail.

[Download](http://www./download/yssme6nf03ku2e9/Grob+G+115+%28Tutor%29.craft)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-23T13:39:04Z" title="07/23/2015 01:39  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 23, 2015</time> by Commander Jebidiah**

I am, it's nice to see small propeller craft like this instead of Murica fever inducing high performance fighter jets. 

Have some rep!
I actually like it, but I have my own trainer for my pilots. But I use FAR so I have some different requirements. It isnt to different than yours.

> 
> Got any pics?

Unfortunately no, I never bothered to take pics of my trainer aircraft. If I remember tonight I will take some.
